title: Oceanic LoL Community Games
body:
VERY SHORT NOTICE - Looking to hold this weekly

Oceanic LoL Community Games

At 6pm tonight (7pm AEDT) I will be hosting community games.
Game modes will be available based on numbers available and vote

The Twisted Treeline 3v3 
Summoner's Rift 5v5

Teams will play in a single elimination bracket: http://challonge.com/44ez1iad

We will be selecting teams on Teamspeak 3.

Teamspeak address: ugr.ddns.net

If you dont have teamspeak 3 you can download from here: https://www.teamspeak.com/downloads

Jump on teamspeak with your username as your IGN if you are interested in playing.
